column5: Took my neice Katie and my nephew Isaiah out to a local pond for a couple hours today to get some fish. Both the kids had a blast playing with the sunfish and although he wouldn't hold it for a picture Isaiah also caught his first largemouth.  By the end of the trip Isaiah was the only one that didn't want to leave.. but I heard "one more fish" too many times.. food called to me. lol  Good times with family.
Awesome report.  and a largie to boot.!  congrats.
That is awesome Rich Good on you for taking them out Some real beauties in there!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sweet Report Rich! Always a good time out with family!  I love it! Thanks for sharing!
